parts.text:
Caption:
College students, heads up! ChatGPT Plus is FREE in the US & Canada until May! What are you building with it? ðŸ¤” (I still think higher ed is closer to collapse than we think...)

Hashtags:
#ChatGPT #AI #College

Call to Action:
Reply with your coolest ChatGPT project!

Visual Description for Image:
The image is a split-screen composition. On the left, a brightly lit, modern university library with students studying at tables, bathed in warm, inviting light. The color palette is dominated by warm wood tones, soft blues, and greens, creating a studious and optimistic atmosphere. On the right, a starkly contrasting image: a dimly lit, almost dystopian scene of a crumbling lecture hall, with peeling paint and empty seats. The color palette here is muted and desaturated, with grays, browns, and hints of faded blues. A single, flickering fluorescent light casts long, ominous shadows. The overall mood is one of decay and uncertainty. The split emphasizes the contrast between the idealized image of higher education and a more pessimistic view of its future. A subtle, stylized graphic of the ChatGPT logo is overlaid on the library side, subtly linking the free access to a potential alternative to traditional education. The image aims to be thought-provoking and visually arresting, prompting viewers to consider the future of education.
